trans-unit.source: Specifies the edge or edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface where design-time processing is performed, such as a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> location on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임 처리는 수행는 같은 워크플로 디자인 화면에서 가장자리 또는 activity designer의 가장자리를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> 활동 디자이너의 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> that specifies where on the activity designer a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> or a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects reside.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]반환 되는 열거형 값 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>activity designer의 위치를 지정 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>컬렉션 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>개체가.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> method can be used to retrieve this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A>이 컬렉션을 검색 하려면 메서드를 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use it to determine which edge or edges of an activity designer a user is resizing by observing the DesignerEdges enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.
trans-unit.target: DesignerEdges 열거형 값을 관찰 하 여 사용자가 크기를 조정 하는 디자이너 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A> 에서 반환 하는 활동의 가장자리를 확인 하려면 에서도 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: All edges of the activity designer.
The bottom edge of the activity designer.
The left edge of the activity designer.
None of the edges of the activity designer.
The right edge of the activity designer.
The top edge of the activity designer.
